p: Nuclear transcription factor (PXR) can regulate a suite of genes involved in the metabolism, transport, and elimination of their substances, such as CYP3A4 and MRP, therefore, it is regarded as an important target to treat cholestatic liver disorders. So compound 76 was assayed for agonistic effects on PXR. Compound 76 displayed the significant agonistic effect on PXR with EC 50 value of 134.91 Â± 2.01 nM [ 33].
